tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geospatial_data_table (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    coordinates GEOMETRY,
    route_start TIMESTAMP,
    route_end TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_location_id INT,
  end_location_id INT,
  distance DECIMAL,
  duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE locations (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
latitude DECIMAL(10, 8) NOT NULL,
longitude DECIMAL(11, 8) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE routes (route_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
route_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
distance DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
start_location_id INT NOT NULL,
end_location_id INT NOT NULL,
FOREIGN KEY (start_location_id) REFERENCES locations(id),
FOREIGN KEY (end_location_id) REFERENCES locations(id)

CREATE TABLE optimizations (optimization_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
route_id INT NOT NULL,
completion_date DATE NOT NULL,
cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES routes(route_id)

CREATE TABLE geospatial_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
  longitude DECIMAL(11, 8)
)

CREATE TABLE routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_location VARCHAR(255),
  end_location VARCHAR(255),
  distance DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE places (
  place_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  place_name VARCHAR(255),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  rating DECIMAL(3, 1)
)

CREATE TABLE activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(255),
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  duration_minutes INT
)
